title: Critical Profile Options / Kritik Profil Seçenekleri
description: Shows critical EBS profile option settings

queries.sql: SELECT fpot.profile_option_name, fpv.profile_option_value, fpv.level_id FROM fnd_profile_option_values fpv JOIN fnd_profile_options fpo ON fpv.profile_option_id = fpo.profile_option_id JOIN fnd_profile_options_tl fpot ON fpo.profile_option_id = fpot.profile_option_id WHERE fpot.profile_option_name IN ('CONC_MAX_REQUESTS', 'CONC_MAX_WORKERS', 'GL_SET_OF_BKS_ID', 'PO_HOLD_UNMATCHED_INVOICES') AND fpot.LANGUAGE = 'US' ORDER BY fpot.profile_option_name

doc_hint: Shows critical EBS profile option settings. These control system behavior, concurrent processing, and data visibility rules.
analysis_prompt: Review profile options. Check: (1) CONC_MAX_REQUESTS/WORKERS settings, (2) GL_SET_OF_BKS_ID (GL setup), (3) PO_HOLD settings, (4) any unexpected values.
